function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of consideration for contagious disease transmission in green spaces","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Green space location influencing restorativeness","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Site-level factors and spatial configuration influencing restorativeness and wildlife support","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of water bodies in green spaces","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Safety perception and dense vegetation","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Presence of non-native and invasive plant species negatively affecting avian and lepidopteran communities, potentially leading to population decline and loss of biodiversity.","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative effect of traffic noise on green spaces and bird communities","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of quality assessment of green areas in studies can lead to inconsistent evidence on the effect of green space on health outcomes.","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"On-site studies may suffer from drawbacks such as time, funding, control of confounders, and small sample sizes, limiting the reliability of the findings.","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited investigation of the challenge of meeting human use and biodiversity conservation in a limited space","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited generalizability of findings in laboratory experiments","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Surrender of control and measurement in field studies","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for increased exposure to contagious diseases due to longitudinal studies and data collection during and after the pandemic.","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Natural experiments may expose different groups of people to varying conditions, potentially leading to increased spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Curtailment of field-based empirical research in regions with severe energy challenges and potential epidemic impact","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limits on research approaches during the pandemic may result in important gaps in knowledge generation.","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of overwhelming health systems due to high transmission rates and uncontrolled epidemic growth.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The spread of covid-19 due to ineffective suppression measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative impact on health systems due to school and university closures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term feasibility and sustainability of suppression measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmissibility rebounded once controls were lifted, leading to a resurgence of cases.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prolonged maintenance of non-pharmaceutical interventions npis and drugs until a vaccine is available.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Building population immunity through epidemic without interrupting transmission completely.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain understanding of sars-cov-2 transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High-resolution population density data used to define areas, potentially leading to high population density contact points","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Assumption of per-capita contacts within schools being double those elsewhere, potentially leading to higher transmission rates in schools","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Assumption of 5.1-day incubation period, potentially affecting the timing of disease control measures","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variable infectiousness due to gamma distribution assumption","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Under-ascertainment of infections 40-50%","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption of short-term immunity after recovery","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"30% of hospitalised cases requiring critical care","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overall mean duration of hospitalisation of 10.4 days","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ifr estimates at 0.9% 95% credible interval 0.4%-1.4%","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncontrolled spread of infectious diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in implementation of interventions","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assumptions leading to underestimation of risks","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unmitigated epidemic with predicted deaths","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exceeding critical care bed capacity","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High peak demand on critical care beds beyond surge capacity","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relatively little impact of stopping mass gatherings","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of control measures without overwhelming healthcare systems","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in the reproduction number r0 and severity of the virus","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prolonged implementation of social distancing measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large stocks of vaccine not available for 18 months or more","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective mitigation strategies may lead to overwhelming the healthcare system capacity","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large epidemics of covid-19 in europe","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited testing capacity leading to biased view of infection trends.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited testing capacity leading to underestimation of true infections","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Higher proportion of the population infected in spain 15.0%","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low percentage of individuals infected, with an attack rate on average of 4.9%.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"}]}
